EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-02-HA Storage.01.01_19_2016-HAStorage-Q1-Invite.01.Invite 01_19_2016-In
EmailTemplate.subject: H.A. Storage/VMTurbo: Technical Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
VMTurbo is co-hosting a Technical Workshop with H.A. Storage <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ha-storage-technical-workshop-vmturbo-tickets-20946330037]]> and we hope to see you there! This event is an opportunity to participate in a hands-on workshop to learn about the benefits of partnering with H.A. Storage, a specialized value added reseller of data storage and management products and solutions that provides customized solutions. The event will take place on Friday, March 4, 2016 from 11:30 AM to 4:00 PM EST at the H.A. Storage office on 820 Adams Avenue, Audobon, PA. Click here to register for the event <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ha-storage-technical-workshop-vmturbo-tickets-20946330037]]>. You'll also learn more about VMTurbo, an application performance control system that can help you achieve a 30% improvement on response time, number of transactions and infrastructure within 30 days. Click here to learn more <[[http://vmturbo.com/partners/h.a.storage/]]>. Hope to see you there!
